content: this calla lily flower is fast and easy to make for a wedding bouquet as well as a vase the main section consists of crocheting in the round with half_double_crochet stitches with just a slight change on the last stitch to form the flower s peak craft dowels painted green then connect the center and main section together i generally recommend using 100% cotton yarn of the dishcloth variety or any kind of stiffer type of yarn also it s best to use the smallest crochet hook possible so your stitches are tighter this helps the flower keep its shape there is a step-by-step tutorial video for this pattern enjoy
